amendment.description: Amendment approves established National Marine Fisheries Service policy regarding the process for approving community development plans in small Alaskan communities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to include provisions regarding eligibility to participate in the Western Alaska Community Development Quota Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
